Reviews.Content: We had 50 people at an Adult Sunday School Class Retreat and I can honestly say ALL were WOWED by the facilities, amenities, accomodating staff, ETC.! This will DEFINITELY be our new yearly retreat location!!!! Not only that, but many in the group will be planning family get-aways here!!!! God gave us a perfect Oct. weekend and The Village provided beautiful accomodations!

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!!”
Reviews.Author: Sarah L
Reviews.Content: We loved our stay at the Village at Indian Point! We went for our honeymoon and they had a bottle of champagne waiting, complimentary glasses, a picture frame and a certificate for 15% off our next stay. They were so nice and helpful and we even got to bring our dog! It was very homey and we didn't want to leave, loved it! We didn't really do any touristy stuff but it was very close to everything down there, but we didn't feel like we were in the hustle and bustle. We will definitley be making a trip back!

Reviews.Title: “Really enjoyed the stay!”
Reviews.Author: gina d
Reviews.Content: We had a four night stay in Lodge 15 condo 5. Great view of the lake and tree tops. Quality furnishings and decor. Better than the pictures. The Bondurants did a great job.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Property”
Reviews.Author: pmeiii
Reviews.Content: My family stayed at Village at Indian Point (VIP) from 8/29/11 to 9/2/11. The condo was building 20 unit 10. It was very nice, just as described. It did come with a boat stall on the dock without an additional charge. Each unit is privately owned, and this one was exceptional. The unit was a top floor condo with a view of the lake, a nicely appointed deck with outdoor furniture. Two bedrooms, two baths, two nice high-definition LCD TV's. The Pros: 1) The price-10% discount for staying 4 nights or more 2) Location-As close to attractions as you can get 3) The staff-Very friendly and helpful (prior to visit and once you get there) 4) Extremely Clean and Fresh 5) Pool is very nice 6) Not crowded, could be the time of year that we were there The Cons: 1) Cooking untensils were low end-Bring your own pans (I know, I am picky) 2) Distance to the lake/dock-Long walk or short drive with plenty of parking 3) No boat launch All in all, not much to complain about here. I am really digging to come up with the cons, as you can tell. I will be staying at VIP again and have already recommended it to family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience!!!”
Reviews.Author: Jerry H
Reviews.Content: We had a three day rental in the newest building. It was a beautifully decorated lake view condo. Paulette in the front office was very professional. We are looking to buy and this one is our choice of a professionally managed property.

Reviews.Title: “Surprised, delighted - we've found a new home!”
Reviews.Author: Darlene W
Reviews.Content: When we walked into unit 1610, even the teenagers said "Wow"! The decor is fantastic and we understand some of the furniture was made by the owner. The kitchen fulfilled our every wish as did the gorgeous bathrooms. The loft was an extra bonus. All the furniture was comfortable. The screened-in balcony with a wonderful view of the lake was a treat because of the beauty and silence. We saw lots of deer. We have been coming to the Branson area every year since 1972 and have never stayed anywhere to compare to this. The two pool areas are great - neat hot tub. Great sauna and game room. Even has tether ball. Staff was very friendly. We've found a new home!

Reviews.Title: “"The best condo rental property at the lake"”
Reviews.Author: Boaters63
Reviews.Content: This is the 8th time I've styaed at The Village at Indian Point, and its the 6th different condo I've had. There just aren't too many places one could go back to 8 times and have it be perfect every time, but the Village has been and is! Great condo again, great people in the office that are helpful and pleasant to work with, and its always an overall great experience. I highyl recomkmend the Village at Indian Point to anyone and everyone

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home!”
Reviews.Author: Gatordoc01
Reviews.Content: I agree with every review. You cannot go wrong booking a condo here. We stayed in bldg 17 unit 6 and will return. The decor, amenities, cleanliness, and view are superb!!! It was beyond my expectation when I booked it. You CAN checkin after-hours and you need to call the office ahead of time so they can make arrangements with you. The proximity to silver dollar city (3min) made it so easy for us to visit with small children. Though this is not a negative, I would recommend bringing outlet covers if you have small children, as a precaution, as our condo did not have them placed. They may now after reading this.

Reviews.Title: “Surprised!”
Reviews.Author: DebbyJ_11
Reviews.Content: We've always stayed at hotels and decided to try something different. Usually the pictures posted on websites are years old and the actual rooms are not what you had envisioned. The Village surpassed our expectations! Bldg 11, condo 9 was quiet, great view of the lake, two decks, everything we needed and MORE! Having the covered and lighted boat slip included in the price was great. Parking the boat trailer was a little tricky, but not having to pull the boat out of the water every night was worth it. Pools were wonderful, as was the hot tub and game room. Very convenient location! We will be back next summer!

Reviews.Title: “GREAT CONDO!!! ENJOYED EVERY MINUTE AT VILLAGE AT INDIAN POINT !!!”
Reviews.Author: Lacy2002
Reviews.Content: When we opened the door to our condo (Bldg 17 #9) we both said WOW!!! The way the condo was decorated with all the rustic furniture and all the bears we just loved it. It had everything we needed to make us feel right at home. The balcony was great. The large table and swing was great for meals and relaxing in the evenings. We were given a boat slip at no extra cost. We enjoyed our stay so much I am sure we will be back. I am looking forward to next years visit. Sharon B. Louisville, KY

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: mhurtado40
Reviews.Content: had a good time. lodge 5 condo 7 was nice and clean. plenty of room for all 6 of us. lots to do in the area. the pools and hot tub were great .... we will be back !

Reviews.Title: “The Weeks Family, McAlester, OK, loved Lodge #16, Condo #7!”
Reviews.Author: Sharon W
Reviews.Content: Greeting from McAlester, OK, and the Weeks Family! We stayed in Lodge #16, Condo #7 earlier this month, and loved it! Gorgeous relaxing lake view from the deck! Beautifully decorated interior! Everything was perfect! We've visit Branson often, and have stayed elsewhere in the past. However, no other lodging compares to the Village at Indian Point. Love the military and gasoline discounts they offer, as well! The Village is also pet friendly (lower level only), which is nice for pet lovers. THE WEEKS FAMILY VOTES THE VILLAGE AT INDIAN POINT #1!

Reviews.Title: “unit 12 condo 12 a great stay”
Reviews.Author: ross a
Reviews.Content: The Village is a great place to stay. My kids had a great time. It is only a few miles from Silver Dollar City. We got season passes and would drop off our teens and relax looking over the lake. The condo was super nice.

Reviews.Title: “Would definitely stay again!”
Reviews.Author: SuttonFamKc
Reviews.Content: Owners decorated this unit (2102) so nicely and it had everything we needed. They allowed us to bring our well-behaved dog so we didn't have to leave her behind. We may go back in the fall and would certainly return here.

Reviews.Title: “A relaxing, scenic setting in a condo with a superb decorative touch”
Reviews.Author: Peggy W
Reviews.Content: When we come back, we will definitely stay here. The location, new pool, beautiful condo in a woodsy setting but close to everything was just what we were looking for! The office staff was helpful & friendly -- just be sure to check out any DVD's before 5, as they close for the day, it appears, at that time.

Reviews.Title: “We would come back to the Branson area just to stay at Village at Indian Point!”
Reviews.Author: chio99
Reviews.Content: I was attracted by the great reviews, the promise of abundant amenities, and the two-bed, two-bath set-up since our four-member family was traveling with my mother-in-law. This place did not disappoint. Whomever owns the condo in which we stayed had decorated it beautifully, and we felt as if we were visiting a good friend's home. It was extremely clean, the kitchen was well-stocked with dishes and tools, the laundry room included a full-size washer and dryer and the pools/hot tub/game room were a big hit with our family. The balcony/deck was gigantic, spanning the width of the condo and accessible from the living room or master suite sliding glass doors - perfect for winding down the day with a glass of wine, listening to the sounds of the lake below and enjoying the gorgeous scenery. We couldn't have been more pleased, and this was one of our most enjoyable travel experiences as a family. Also, we were going to get two "regular" hotel rooms for our group of five, which were actually going to be more expensive than Village at Indian Point .

Reviews.Title: “Family Reunion”
Reviews.Author: Oklahoma63
Reviews.Content: This facility was very nice. We were there for a family reunion. They had us all grouped in one building except for one family and they did not identify themselves as being part of or group. Very clean, completely stocked with dishes, pans and linens plus a washer and dryer. We didn't need the laundry facilities, but that was completely unexpected. Their new outdoor pool is lovely. It was a good size, but with the large volume of people on our weekend, it could have been bigger, but I'm sure most of the time it's more than adequate. The area for little ones was great. We had a nine month old in our group and he loved the water spouts. Everyone in our group and we had 5 families was more than pleased. We would recommend to anyone. The setting above Table Rock Lake was beautiful. The balconies were very nice. Ours was actually screened in and had lovely furniture. Great for that early morning cup of coffee.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful condo and place to stay”
Reviews.Author: LuLuCZ
Reviews.Content: We felt very pampered--our condo (#21 unit #2) was just beautiful with a deck looking at the lake. We loved having a kitchen with dishwasher, great places to sit and two bedrooms, two bathrooms. I very much appreciated having a washer and dryer in the condo. The outdoor pool was awesome and was open until 11 pm. The kids and I loved hanging out there. The ladies at the registration desk were very helpful--they answered many questions and helped us extend our stay by a night. We definitely want to come back.

Reviews.Title: “LOVED IT - LOVED IT - LOVED IT”
Reviews.Author: Deb0711
Reviews.Content: We stayed for three nights and will most definitely go there again. It is an amazing place, and sooo very UNCOMMERCIALIZED.....UNIQUE AND BEAUTIFUL TO SAY THE LEAST. each unit is individual owners whom take great pride in their units .

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Top Notch”
Reviews.Author: ErtaALEPele
Reviews.Content: We were happily surprised. Absolutely breath taking; stunning view of Table Rock Lake. Clean and comfortable accommodations. Privacy was beyond what we expected for the price. Lovely kitchen and spacious clean bathrooms. The new outdoor pool and hot tub made for a nice retreat and good place to socialize. Very friendly!

Reviews.Title: “Always say three nice things first and then...”
Reviews.Author: sunandsizzle
Reviews.Content: Our unit was immaculate and free of bugs even though it was situated among trees. The decor was typical lake cottage and tastefully done. As most condos don't always come supplied with condiments, paper products, etc., it was a pleasant surprise to find these amenities. (They may have been left by previous guests.) Of particular benefit was an in-unit washer and dryer. The pool had ample lounge chairs and BBQ pits were plentiful throughout the grounds. The location was convenient to nearby boating and water activities as well as Silver Dollar City. A pool-side firepit and in room fireplace would make an autumn visit inviting. I would suggest requesting a top floor unit if you can make the trek up the flights of stairs. We had neighbors who partied until 3:00 AM. We did not have a contact number for management to report their behavior, but I don't know that they would have been helpful. When we attempted to leave a cooler with them prior to check-in, the front desk personnel were very indifferent. They also close the check-in at 5:00 PM, but one cannot check in until 3:30PM. That's a small window to time arrival. If you sleep lightly, be aware that the plumbing pipes are not insulated well and every flush, shower, and dishwasher sound is audible from your neighbors.

Reviews.Title: “Great and will be returning”
Reviews.Author: ChuckJenny
Reviews.Content: Enough room for everyone to be comfortable and more, relaxing, great views, very nice people, clean and just simply wonderful. We will be back to this place to enjoy all it has to offer. We could have had a great time just staying at the resort, in fact next time we stay there we plan on spending even more time there. Would recommend to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Family Reunion--great place with party room”
Reviews.Author: Calico1102
Reviews.Content: My family, about 46 people total, had a family reunion and I thought this location was wonderful. The party room was just right for a group of 25-75 people and had a nice kitchen adjoining with full size refrigerator we made good use of. The lodges are very comfortable with great views of the lake on the balconies. I would recommend that visitors consider bringing along food though because the fast food places are quite far away and crowded. The lodges have kitchens and ours had a full set of dishes, very clean. The carpet in the lodges I saw looked brand new. Keep in mind the late check in time (I think 3 p.m.) and the early check out time (10:30) in your plans though.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: TripletMama2007
Reviews.Content: We all had a ball at the Village at Indian Point! The condo was nice, the pools were awesome and my kids loved the fishing poles they had available for use!

Reviews.Title: “The Village is our favorite place to stay - we'll buy a condo there”
Reviews.Author: Brian1234575
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at various places on Indian Point throughout the years and The Village is by far the best. We plan to purchase a condo there in the near future.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place”
Reviews.Author: zoomWaco
Reviews.Content: We would recommend this place. Very nice. Very clean and comfotable. It was also good to be able to buy tickets for shows in the lobby. Saves alot of waiting in line at the box office.

Reviews.Title: “Best place we've stayed in the area”
Reviews.Author: tgkeas02
Reviews.Content: We like staying at the village, more like home. very, very nice. awesome having a boat slip with the condo we stayed at 11- #12. It was starting to get a little dated, also, it needed more comfortable furniture, like a couple of recliners. the deck is to die for with an awesome view. Would definitly go back and stay!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic place”
Reviews.Author: raytheater
Reviews.Content: Very nice room, very nice view and very nice service. The room was fantastically situated to face Table Rock Lake, so the view was just great. The balcony was a place to just sit and relax with a couple of beers at night. The decor of the rooms matters not, you are just "borrowing" someone else room for your vacation. There's a boat dock that is wonderful to just sit and fish off, beware of turtles though. The indoor, outdoor and hot tub was enjoyed by my family. You are paying a premium though if you want a room with jacuzzi and facing the lake. You will be paying a huge Chicago price, over 200 dollars for the room. Overall, my family enjoyed this place greatly.

Reviews.Title: “First time to Branson and we loved the facilities”
Reviews.Author: johnH57LakeStLouis
Reviews.Content: The condo was great with everything we needed for a great stay. Very nice new outdoor pool with a shallow area and fountains for children. The office staff was very friendly and helpful with directions and suggestions on places to go. I would stay their again on future visits.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and hope to be back soon.”
Reviews.Author: CatRik
Reviews.Content: We have adult children and we wanted to try out a condo for comfort and convenience. To our surprise, check in was easy even though we arrived late at night. The staff was helpful. The condo was clean and comfortable. The view was beautiful. I had some concerns about value for my money, but it was money well spent. We hope to return for another family weekend in the future.

Reviews.Title: “You won't be disappointed!”
Reviews.Author: dreamweaver1117
Reviews.Content: We've stayed in these condo's for about 7 years and have never had a bad experience! We have found our favorite one and reqeust it every time we go, which is a couple times a year. I love that the location isn't right in the middle of the Branson hype, but close enough you can get there within minutes. We'll NEVER stay anywhere else!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, family friendly”
Reviews.Author: tracyfamily5
Reviews.Content: Great clean spacious 2 bed, 2 bath condo. Close to Silver Dollar City and Indian Point Marina. Loved the outdoor pool. Wished the fishing dock was closer to the room. Quiet, scenic, stuff for the whole family.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely! Great deck!”
Reviews.Author: leftbrainart
Reviews.Content: Very nicely furnished, lovely kitchen and the deck was very nice and large enough for 9 to cozy up to the table for meals.We had 2 condos, one with a loft. Each bedroom only had one king bed. It would have been nice if the second bedroom would of had two beds so my grand children (a boy and girl) could have had their own bed. The living room does have a sofa bed. Light blocking blinds in the bedroom would have been nice.. But..........considering all things, it was great and we were all very pleased. We would be happy to return!

Reviews.Title: “Love VIP”
Reviews.Author: Kates_family11
Reviews.Content: Village at Indian Point is awesome! Great location on the lake, wonderful staff and nice, clean condos. The nature trails, pools, game room, hot tub and private dock sweeten the deal. We love this place and will keep coming back!

Reviews.Title: “Where the Village is placed makes a difference!”
Reviews.Author: melemomma
Reviews.Content: I had made arrangements at a different village on Indian point and was appalled! I had brought guests from another country and there was NO WAY I felt I could stay at the first resort! I was soooooo embarrassed! I literally raced to the Village at Indian Point to check on availability! It was absolutely WONDERFUL! The condo was spacious, decorated cute and most importantly CLEAN!!!!!!!! We had a wonderful time. It was convenient to the marina, restaurants and even little quickmarts! We didn't even need to go into the city of Branson! I plan on spreading the word among my family and friends!

Reviews.Title: “Great location for family Reunions!”
Reviews.Author: Jrh38
Reviews.Content: We do a large family reunion every five years and this time we held it at The Village at Indian Point. We absolutely loved the resort. The condos are great. Each one is decorated differently and has it's own style. The new outdoor pool was awesome and definitely was a high point. We had almost 80 people at the reunion which pushed the capacity of the banquet room. The website says they can accommodate 100 people but that is probably pushing it. It would also be nice if they had an on site restaurant. The condos do each have their own kitchen though and there are groceries very close by so you can do your own cooking and save on food. All in all we really enjoyed it and will definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for our needs”
Reviews.Author: Mmachens
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Village at Indian Point for a short weekend. It was perfect for our needs. We spent the weekend at Silver Dollar City. Easy in and out between the park and the condo. Not a problem to leave the park for nap time and get back without feeling like a beat was missed. The condo had adequate space. It was fully furnished. There were even games and coloring books in our room for our kids to play with. Our kids, 3, 5 and 7 all enjoyed playing in both the indoor and outdoor pools. The hot tub was nice and relaxing. There is a small grocery store and ice cream parlor close to the property. The view of the lake was pretty. Coming from Hwy. 65 and Lambert's Cafe, you can miss all of the Branson traffic which was nice.

Reviews.Title: “A place to relax”
Reviews.Author: RumJ0731
Reviews.Content: The Village at Indian Point was fantastic! Very relaxing for the families weekend trip to Silver Dollar City (6 minutes from the parking lot) . The lodges were very comfortable and provided all the necessary items for a small family to be comfortable. The beds were firm to hard and the ceilings are a little thin when there are kids running around upstairs. Would try to stay on an upstairs floor when I went back a second time.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait for the next reunion!”
Reviews.Author: KattnMatt
Reviews.Content: We recently spent time in the Grand Tetons, Yellowstone and Rock Mountain National Parks and when we walked into our room we immediately felt like we were back in the national parks! What great decor and accomodations; the fully stocked kitchen, electric grill, the ice maker and great water pressure for those of you who don't bathe in the lake are very appreciated. We also took advantage of the the boat slip and what a great way to store a boat during a stay. The pool and game room was also loved by all at the end of our hot lake activity days. Thank you for such great attention to details!

Reviews.Title: “1st Time at The Village at Indian Point”
Reviews.Author: RZion
Reviews.Content: It was our first time staying at The Village at Indian Point. LOVED IT!!! Checked into the resort and went to our condo right away. Walked in and loved the decor and details. Fully stocked kitchen and big electric grill on the deck. After 20 minutes of being there called front desk to rebook the same lodge for the fall. The only negative things I can say is the beds were really firm(need bed topper to make them more comfortable) and it would be nice to have one cabinet empty for our food. Loved the view of the lake from our deck. We grilled several times and eat dinner out on the deck. The sunrises were beautiful!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: MIKEHPAMH
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay and the ability to have our golden retriever and labrador retriever stay with us. We would highly recommend this resort. IT WAS FANTASTIC!!!

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely LOVED it”
Reviews.Author: kmiles27
Reviews.Content: Everything about this stay was great. The accommodations were beautiful. Our unit was wonderfully decorated, high end furnishings, 2 jacuzzi tubs, 2 king size 'Sleep Number' beds. The location was perfect. Less than 5 minutes to SDC and usually driving against traffic. Would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home while in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: HijoGris
Reviews.Content: The condo was large enough for two couples and teenage son on sofa bed. It is next door to Silver Dollar City and a few miles from the entertainment strip in Branson. Great location! They have a small gym, an indoor pool, hot tube, and newly constructed out door pool. Encountered doe in parking lot one morning when taking trash to dumpster!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay”
Reviews.Author: PenFam
Reviews.Content: This was our first time to stay at the Village at Indian Point and we have found our place to stay when we visit Branson. It was wonderful! Loved the location, scenery, ammenities, decor and staff. Our stay there was perfect!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful”
Reviews.Author: Connie067
Reviews.Content: Loved this place. Beautiful surroundings, but the condo was very nice also. Stayed in a 2 bedroom, 2 bath, loft condo with my husband, parents, and my children. Plenty of room and very clean when we arrived. Spectacular view from the balcony, and everything we needed was there, right down to the corkscrew. I only saw the staff once, so thought is would not be fair to really rate them one way or the other, but we never needed them on our two night stay. Indoor pool was wonderful, immaculately clean. Went to silver dollar city for the bluegrass and barbecue and it was really a good day. My only complaint was the rock-hard mattress we slept on, but that's really a preference; some may appreciate extra firmness, but not my husband and I. The bedrooms were very large, the bathrooms had jetted tubs that were huge, and there was plenty of room in the rest of the place for everyone to relax and be very comfortable. We hope to visit again and see some shows and do some fishing. We'll go back this summer I hope!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect choice for silver dollar city.”
Reviews.Author: nefans
Reviews.Content: These lodges are close to silver dollar city, which was was main destination in Branson. These were are first condo rentals and we were very happy. Plenty of room for a family of four. Plenty of dishes and cooking utensils. We were able to get to all of our Branson shows within 20 minutes. No issues encountered.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from Home”
Reviews.Author: Mtrelaxationandfun
Reviews.Content: We have been visiting Branson for 11 years now. We have stayed in many of the other condos/cabins; such as Still Waters and Stonebridge, and find Village at Indian Point to be the best all around!! You have the luxury and; in some units, the cabin feel of the Ozarks!! Talking around we found that this place only gets better as years go on; unlike many of the surrounding condos. Without a doubt we found our home away from home in Branson!!! Thank you all at Indian Point for your outstanding service and dedication to serve your visitors and making us feel at home!!!

Reviews.Title: “Wonders of the World”
Reviews.Author: susanbourbeau
Reviews.Content: I reviewed many opportunities to stay in Missouri and found Village At Indian Point the perfect place. I was traveling with my daughter for a college interview and knowing her feelings about God's beauty your place topped the list. Our stay was wonderful and the interview went well. We hope to stay once again in the beauty that you showed us not only by nature but also the personality of the employees. Respectfully, Susan and Danielle Bourbeau Arkansas

Reviews.Title: “Perfect condo for family groups!”
Reviews.Author: kst8er76
Reviews.Content: Amazing condo with beautiful view of the lake. The loft was a hit with the kiddos. Having a full kitchen, 2 bathrooms, and a living room area was so much more relaxing and accomodating than staying in a traditional hotel. We plan to visit again soon!! Also, very close to Silver Dollar City and a short drive to the main part of Branson. Don't miss out on theTalking Rocks Cave & Butterfly Palace while you are there too!! Also, the room looked very much like the photos on the website, which isn't always the case.

Reviews.Title: “Wondeful stay at Village at Indian Point”
Reviews.Author: valch
Reviews.Content: Condo was clean and quiet. Plenty of room for our family of five. We will stay here every time we head to Branson. Loved that it is right next to Silver Dollar City!

Reviews.Title: “We love the lake, serenity and condo!”
Reviews.Author: EZMomBSKS
Reviews.Content: This was our third stay here. We love the location, outside of the hussle/bussle of Branson, but close enough to enjoy all the action. The view from our third-floor condo was fantastic and it was decorated very nice. I love that our family can cook in the kitchen that has all the supplies you need. With the washer/dryer in the condo, we don't have to over pack for our large family. The pool is smaller, but nice for the kids. We love the large hot tub. Game room is a little limited and crowded, but good for a rainy day. Our condo in bldg. 20, room 9 didn't have good quality beds which is why I rated this a little low and the deck door didn't lock. However, the other two condos we stayed in had quality beds and I will request those next time. Getting a good night's sleep is important when you're away from home. As the other reviewers have mentioned, the jacuzzi tubs in the rooms don't work particularly well because of hot water. However, a room with a jacuzzi has a larger bathroom in the master and is much nicer than when we didn't have the jacuzzi. This condo is on the same road as Silver Dollar City, but that traffic has NEVER been a problem . . . the close proximity is actually great. Front desk personnel are WONDERFUL. They make great suggestions for local things to do and can tell you about the shows. Talk with those ladies - they are very nice.

Reviews.Title: “Squeaky clean & quiet”
Reviews.Author: poorpiper
Reviews.Content: The staff was very accommodating to change our reservations not just once, but twice. We were ever so happy that it was pet friendly. The unit was sparkling clean. It was very comfortable and spacious. The deck was huge and we could access it from both the living space & the main bedroom. Loved the woods and the quiet. The pool area was great too. Might want to bring dish soap though..none provided.

Reviews.Title: “Nice visit”
Reviews.Author: nancuj85
Reviews.Content: We had a great visit with friends we meet here with their small pet. They were very pleased with the accomodations. There was a smell in the condo that I could not put a finger on. Ladies at the front desk were nice. Only problem we had the key did not work the first time and had to go back to the office, luckily even though the office was closed someone was there & gave us another key. Since we were off season, it was quiet and peaceful - deer were present. Not a good view of the lake, but since we had a pet with us, we were pleased with what we got. Did have some problems with the wi-fi.

Reviews.Title: “Fun family get-away!”
Reviews.Author: Sunpoo3
Reviews.Content: We took our two kids under the age of 7 and my parents. We had a blast. It was way cold, but way fun. The Lodge is beautiful, clean, and great views! Full kitchen and even a washer and dryer. What more can you ask for? And, the price was economical and you get what you pay for! INDOOR POOL!

Reviews.Title: “Second time here.....loved it again.”
Reviews.Author: MissouriTravelFamily
Reviews.Content: This was our second trip to VIP. Stayed in the same condo. Appreciate that the family postponed their trip to allow us to use their condo again. Paulette was awesome (as usual). We brought another couple with a son about our son's age and the two boys had a blast using the loft as their "treehouse." Love the location. Loved our lake view. Loved the condo. Loved the pool/hot tub. All the normal stuff that we enjoyed during our last trip there in October. Only complaint that we have is that the quality of the mattresses in the unit are so far beneath what we are accustomed to that sleeping is really not that comfortable. But, we are spoiled and have only the finist of bedding at our home. Acceptable bedding, but would really like to see those mattresses brought up in comfort a bit. Would still rent same condo over and over again, and are planning to later this year. Thanks again. Can't wait to return.

Reviews.Title: “a great way to bring in the new year!!!!”
Reviews.Author: celestina2192
Reviews.Content: We did a 4 night trip between Christmas and New Years and everyone just loved it. Condo, staff, location and the trip was just perfect!!!!

Reviews.Title: “IT WAS GREAT!”
Reviews.Author: J_J_KTBug
Reviews.Content: The condo we rented was absolutely wonderful! Everything from the decor to the view to the lake! We were in 17-4, lodge theme decorated with bears, a pet friendly unit. We have stayed here several times and this one is our favorite. We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful visit, great condo, we'll return!”
Reviews.Author: SKMallon
Reviews.Content: We were lucky to stay in a wonderful condo (11-1) that was charming and comfortable. It was our first time to travel with our pet and this place was just the spot! Only complaint was the partial view of the lake was pretty small but other than that, the whole family enjoyed the place - we had togetherness plus privacy because of the layout of the rooms (separated by a bathroom) which you don't get in a hotel unless you pay for an extra room. Bummed I didn't have time to use the jacuzzi, and we couldn't get the free wi-fi to work, the instructions were kinda convuluted. The condo came well equipped with everything we needed to stay even longer. Paulette was very helpful to us in providing us with a listing of the shows available the week after Christmas which saved us a lot of phone calls. And Silver Dollar City at Christmas time is not to be missed! We literally spent 5 minutes on the road to get there, park, had a shuttle pick us up and deliver us to the front door, and then another 5 minute drive back to the condo. That was terrific!

Reviews.Title: “Great condo, but not for a short stay”
Reviews.Author: JustUs19020
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Indian Point the weekend before Christmas. Great location just down the road from Silver Dollar City but off the main drag. We requested a jacuzzi pet- friendly condo with lake view. Contrary to other reviews we've read about Indian Point, the condo was immaculate (building 17 room 4), which had concerned me about a pet- friendly room. Kitchen and bathrooms were spotless, and none of the carpet stains or strange smells that have been mentioned about other condos! its definately worth requesting. The only downside was the jacuzzi tub- there was only enough hot water to fill the huge tub about 2" from the bottom, which brings the water level about 5" under the jets, rendering it unusabe as a jacuzzi (and we werent using hot water for showers, dishes, or laundry at the time). No big deal, except you pay more for a room with a jacuzzi tub. The view from the deck was fantastic, and it was obvious that the owners have a lot of pride in their place. We werent crazy about the office staff; we only met two women at the front desk and they werent particularly friendly. Not rude, but just seemed annoyed to be bothering with us when we stopped by the office to check in and check out. We probably would not return here, but mostly because its too much for a weekend. The atmosphere is better for a week-long getaway, when you can go to the grocer, cook your meals in the kitchen, make your own beds, etc. For a weekend getaway, better to spend the same money at a hotel and get the room service, fresh towels, and enough hot water to get the jacuzzi jets going

Reviews.Title: “LOVED LOVED LOVED Village at Indian Point”
Reviews.Author: lawspike
Reviews.Content: Absolutely loved our condo there. The check-in lodge was beautiful and our view was amazing. The owners of our condo did an impeccable job decorating the condo. It was clean, the price was amazing and the property was beautiful! We WILL be staying there again, hopefully this summer!

Reviews.Title: “The most memorable family Christmas ever!”
Reviews.Author: charitifoltz
Reviews.Content: The condo we rented was absolutely spectacular! I'm talking EVERYTHING from the decor to the view to the pool! We loved it all. I had this picture in my head of a "cabin in the woods family Christmas" and that is exactly what I got. We hope to make this a new family tradition. The worst part was having to leave.

Reviews.Title: “This place is awesome!”
Reviews.Author: Charlo114
Reviews.Content: We definitely felt like VIP's by staying at VIP. The views of the lake were spectacular and the accomodations were excellent. The double jacuzzis were wonderful. We will recommend this place to our friends!

Reviews.Title: “Felt like home !!”
Reviews.Author: 3xy1xx
Reviews.Content: The lodge room felt like home with recliners, pictures on the wall, wood burning fireplace, useable kitchen, full size washer and dryer. 2 Bedrooms with a pull out couch had plenty of room for a family of 6 plus a baby. Great, happy, and helpful staff. Easy access to Silver Dollar City that avoids the traffic of SH 76.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: HawaiiLover
Reviews.Content: We stayed here during Thanksgiving, 2010~November 24 to November 29. I looked all over the internet for condos, as we have started a tradition for our soon to be 3 year old granddaughter to spend Thanksgiving in Branson & see the lights at Silver Dollar City. Everything was booked because I started looking late. I tried to book Stormy Point thru Expedia, but it was already booked. So, we were down to look at some vacation property & knew we were close to Village at Indian Point, so we decided to visit them personally. Sooooo glad we did! We fell in love with it the moment we drove in! The lodge is absolutely gorgeous! This place is perfect for the Fall! The lady in charge let us take a look at Lodge 13, Unit 5. Corner unit, so there was a small balcony on the side. There was a view of the lake & it was great! We decided to take it! We got a discount because we have AARP & the first night, our daughter wouldn't be there, so they didn't charge the extra $5 for that night. That is one of the few things that bugged us. They charge for more than 2 people. Strange. 2 bedrooms, yet they don't charge by the unit. They go by the number of people staying. Anyway, we saved the equivelant of the tax with the AARP discount. It never dawned on me to look into the cabinets when we were touring the unit. I always prepare our Thanksgiving dinner when we stay. We got there & all that was provided was salt & pepper in the shakers! No staples whatsoever! No mixer, colander, blender or spatula! We had to purchase these things! There was a full size washer & dryer, but no soap or dryer sheets. I have an HE washer & dryer, so purchasing detergent for this one was a total waste of money for me! Guess I will give the detergent to my mom. My daughter has the HE washer, too, so giving it to her is out. Other than that, this place is perfect! They even have candles to light, so it can really be cozy! The fireplace is wood burning, so that was kind of a pain. But, we built some beautiful fires. Our little granddaughter would go out with her 'BahBah' to get the wood & she would bring it in from the beautiful front deck when we were building the fire! So cute! We could never get the DVD player to work in the living room, but the one in each bedroom worked. Also, the thermostat would never stay where we put it. It always reverted back to 62 degrees. A royal pain when you came in from the cold after a long day. The electricity went out on Thanksgiving morning(we have our dinner on Friday each year, so no biggy)for about 2 hours. I just lit the candles & we built a fire & it was nice! The sprayer on the sink needed to be repaired. I turned on the faucet~NOT the sprayer~& it popped off the hose to it & shot water straight up onto the ceiling! NOT fun! It just needed to be screwed back on. I was leary of it the rest of the time! There was plenty of room for 3 adults & a little one. Nice amenities, nice appliances(range needed to be smooth top instead of old fashioned burners~kind of odd for high end appliances), and decorated very nicely! There was a jetted tub in the master bedroom(the view of the lake from the master bedroom was awesome!), but when we tried to use it, the hot water had run out. I ran a load of dishes & our daughter took a short shower right before that. Hot water never returned that evening! This was a 'walk-in' unit & it was really nice not having to walk up or down stairs! The closets were full-size & a welcome for putting our luggage in! The dressers were great, too! Lots of room to store our clothes! We really liked the fact that they didn't give us a long list of what to do when we left. We always leave our 'home away from home' clean & tidy, anyway. We always want to be welcomed back, should we stay again. This was a very quiet place. The condo was very sound. Our granddaughter isn't the quietest of children! She is 3 in January~YOU do the math! LOL! No one complained, so I guess the walls are pretty thick! This is very convenient to Silver Dollar City & Branson West. We were roughly 5 minutes to SDC! We did go into Branson for dinner one night. This was a very smooth experience. Very reasonably priced~$156 per night. For this time of year in Branson & SDC, that is very reasonable for a condo! The entrance is decorated very beautifully! There are 3 waterfalls that are absolutely gorgeous at the entrance. they have beautiful lighted angels, etc adorning the entrance as well as in front of the lodge. Oh! I almost forgot about the pool! We just took it for granted that there would be towels in the pool area. Nope. The ONE time I don't pack beach towels! There is a water element~kind of 3 little fountain type things that spray upward about a foot or so~in the hot tub on a ledge & they don't want you to walk on them or anything like that. Yeah~trying telling a toddler to stay off of THOSE! Riiiiiiight! The water in the hot tub was really nice. They have a kiddie pool that is ice cold. The regular pool was nice. It could have been a few degrees warmer, but it was warmer than most 'heated' pools. They have a nice restroom that has a wicker sofa to sit on while you change. Nice touch. There is a game room that is pretty good & also, an exercise room. The lodge is really beautiful! There are wild animals mounted on the walls & a huge stuffed bear that is awesome! They have a Christmas tree & the lady was nice enough to take our photo in front of it. They have DVDs you can rent for $1(I think that is the cost)& I saw lots of boxed games. There are lots of magazines in the 'lobby' area & a huge fireplace! The deck at the lodge is a wrap around deck & has homemade chairs & glider. This is a really great place & would be something we would think about next year. Or, any time we want to visit. I think the prices may be lower during the summer months. It seems that this time of year is their peak season in this area because of Christmas at Silver Dollar City. OH! If you stay here, or anywhere in Branson~you have GOT to see The Duttons! I am absolutely NOT into the honky tonk, hillbilly stuff, and the Duttons are quite the opposite! They were in the Top 10 on 'America's Got Talent'. They are so worth seeing! Just a suggestion! All in all, you can't go wrong with Village At Indian Point. Very nice place!

Reviews.Title: “Our second stay at The Villages...wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: Vicki67062
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful stay over Thanksgiving this year. We requested the same condo we had during our first stay which was beautifully decorated in a modern traditional theme and the kitchen, again, had every utensil, pot, pan, etc. that we needed! We definitely enjoyed the fireplace this time of year as the temperatures dropped and the rain turned into sleet and snow on Thanksgiving day! Once again, we enjoyed the wonderful indoor pool and jacuzzi! Great location as it is just down the road from Silver Dollar City! Loved it!

Reviews.Title: “A Best Kept Secret”
Reviews.Author: MagnoliaMiMi
Reviews.Content: For the last several years we have stayed at the Village At Indian Point for the holidays. This has been the best kept secret. Our two bedroom two bath condo is definately a home away from home. It is always clean, smartly decorated, fully equipped and is the perfect size for our family of five! And the added perk is that it is located right down from Silver Dollar City. When you discover this perfect package; you'll look no more!

Reviews.Title: “Will stay here again!!”
Reviews.Author: lv2trvl78
Reviews.Content: Our family has season passes to Silver Dollar City so we have made several trips this year to Branson. This has been our favorite place to stay! We loved the close proximity to SDC. The layout of the resort is beautifully situated on Table Rock Lake. I love the lodge/cabin feel of everything. The condo was perfect for our family of 6. We knew if it was going to be cold then we would be comfortable just hanging out and relaxing. We loved the new indoor pool, spa, and gameroom. We will stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Townhouse!”
Reviews.Author: tholt576
Reviews.Content: I have to say these are some of the nicest townhouses I've ever rented and for a very reasonable price. I paid around $340 for two nights all taxes, fees and whatnot included. For that I got a beautifully furnished two bedroom, two bath townhouse with a well appointed kitchen, a large whirlpool tube, access to an indoor pool, a fireplace with a free supply of firewood, a deck overlooking table rock lake, all less than 5 minutes from Silver Dollar City. My family and I loved it.

Reviews.Title: “We will be back next year!”
Reviews.Author: BusyMom21
Reviews.Content: The place we usually stay was booked so I started looking at reviews. The Village had good comments and looked like something that my family would enjoy. We were not disappointed! This place is so nice and family friendly. There was plenty of room and the pool was great. It is located off of the main strip so there is quiet and beautiful scenery but, you are only minutes away from Silver Dollar City. The staff that we met were great also. Thanks so much for all your help. You will be seeing us again in the summer!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Village at Indian Point......You ROCK!”
Reviews.Author: EagleCountry62458
Reviews.Content: We had an awesome visit to the Indian Point area. Close to Silver Dollar City and Table Rock Lake resort areas. We loved the black bear motive in Lodge 20 #1. Also the wood fireplace was awesome. Spotlessly clean rooms and the high speed internet actually worked as advertised. The best review I could give would be the fact that we will definitely stay there again. Village at Indian Point......You ROCK!

Reviews.Title: “Our Branson overnight destination everytime”
Reviews.Author: todd238
Reviews.Content: Secluded ,peacefull, great rooms, always clean. This is where we have decided to make our overnight reservations when we come to the Branson area, which is usually twice a year.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place for Dogs, Too”
Reviews.Author: jbozarth
Reviews.Content: Donna and I really enjoyed our relaxing stay at The Villages on Indian Point. We have stayed there over 6 times and have always found the condos to be clean, well appointed and the staff very helpful. We will go back again in December if possible. Our two Westies always enjoy their stay as well,

Reviews.Title: “Fun relaxing stay!”
Reviews.Author: zaxmail
Reviews.Content: This stay was much better than our last one. The condo was well decorated in a fishing theme. It was very clean, plenty of room for the kids, and a great view!

Reviews.Title: “Just Like Home”
Reviews.Author: Juliefaye
Reviews.Content: We stayed towards the end of October when the Fall colors were turning. We loved the condo, especially the fireplace. The staff was very helpful and the only downside was that there was some plumbing noise when a nearby condo would use the shower. The indoor pool area was so nice as it had an area where my older child could swim, a kiddie pool for my 3yr old and of course the hot tub for mommy. We used the game room and the basketball area to play with our kids. The kitchen was stocked with pots and pans as we had breakfast every day and dinner one night. Overall we would definitely stay there again and plan too. Very close to town but nice and private. It was the closest thing to being at home!

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to go back!”
Reviews.Author: Mombits
Reviews.Content: We absolutely loved our stay here. It was just beautiful. Close enough to Branson to easily make the trip several times a day but far enough away that it was quiet and beautiful. We had a beautiful lakefront view. I have to say- pay the extra for the lake view! My kids fished every day and they just had to walk five minutes to get to the lake. We had two whirlpool tubs, though definitely didn't have enough hot water to fill two tubs- barely enough for one really, but that was minor. Both of the rooms had king beds, which I wasn't expecting, so that was an added bonus. The condo was very well stocked, the only thing we didn't have was paper products: foil, plastic wrap, etc. otherwise it was all furnished. We did bring our own laundry soap, thankfully. You have to wash your own towels as they only furnish one set and if you want more clean towels you pay extra, so if you don't like doing laundry while on vacation, you won't like this. In fact, there is no housekeeping while you are there but I was actually glad not to have a housekeeper in our room while we weren't there. But this is why I gave a little bit lower score on service as basically there isn't any while you are there aside from the very nice lady who works at the desk and they are only open from 9-5. They did leave our room key on the door as promised so that was great. We never could get the free wifi to work there, but that's ok. I was extremely impressed with the condo and would jump at the chance to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “A little piece of heaven!”
Reviews.Author: susan7644
Reviews.Content: The view was spectacular! The condo was decorated beautifully! We enjoyed the private deck overlooking beautiful Table Rock Lake. We were nestled in the woods but yet within 5 minutes of the Branson strip. This is the place to stay. They have walking trails, boat launches, private decks to view the scenery, jacuzzi tubs, and more! We will definitely be back. To make it even better, the price was right. We couldn't have stayed in a hotel on the busy, noisy strip for less than what we paid for a two bedroom condo fully equiped. The proprietors were so nice and so very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Love this place and will definately be back!”
Reviews.Author: JenSpring
Reviews.Content: This location is beautiful! Indian Point has fabulous views of Table Rock Lake and you feel out in the middle of nature. If you want somewhere to stay in Branson that gets you away from all the craziness, this is it. We looked at many other condos on Indian Point while we were there and this place was definately the nicest and most up to date and a great deal for the money. The grounds were maintained and so much to walk and look at. My family and I enjoyed the indoor spa and pool one night. We used the fishing rods for the kids that they checked out. That was fun. The condo itself was cozy and well decorated. Each bedroom was well decorated and we had everything we needed. The only disadvantage to me was that our master bed was too hard. My kids had a blast playing on the deck overlooking the woods. What a great time!!

Reviews.Title: “This was the best place we have ever stayed.”
Reviews.Author: MattandBeth65708
Reviews.Content: Everything was beyond what we expected. The pictures on the website do not the resort justice. It was very quiet and relazed. The staff we encountered were nice and helpful with everything we needed. This is a place my wife and I have already decided to visit again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay out of the Branson traffic”
Reviews.Author: Missouribookworm7
Reviews.Content: Since I found this place 5 years ago, whenever I go to Branson, this is where we choose. It's away from the Branson chaos, beautiful quiet location and we always choose the lakeview condos. We don't have a boat so the marina down at Indian Point it perfectly located if we get in the mood to rent something. We're opposite the Silver Dollar City traffic if we want to go into town during the day and we're less than a mile away if we want to go to the park. It may be a bit of a drive if someone is intensely interested in going downtown or on the Strip a lot but the roads are good and it's not that big a deal for me! We always stay in the 2-bedroom condos, it's such a relaxing, roomy place to stay, so much better for us than staying on the Strip.

Reviews.Title: “Loved The Stay Would Like To Come Again!”
Reviews.Author: elisa26026
Reviews.Content: We had a great and enjoyable time at the resort it made us feel right at home. We where on our four yr anniversary, so decided to take a trip to branson since neither one of us had been in many years. We haven't ever stayed in a condo, so thought we would for a different experience which was very nice and cozy and very close to just about anything you want. We went to the Dixie Stampede show which was fun, great food & service. We also did the zipline Canopy tours out on hwy 65 which is very fun and neat experience something different,but fun. The map we got from the condo was very... helpful and I would highly recommend using the color coded routes through branson will get you to places a lot faster and a lot less traffic. Overall it was a great stay I would for sure mention this place to a family member or friend. So thank you for a great time. Sedalia, Missouri

Reviews.Title: “Great place but some things were not quite right.”
Reviews.Author: Lees2780
Reviews.Content: 2 bdrm condo w/loft was nicely furnished but for $200 per night the mattress was horrible, only about 6" thick. Modern matresses range from 9"-17" thick. The result was a poor nights sleep each night. Supposedly our approx $300k condo was owned by a private party. Also, when shower ran there was a loud noise throughout the condo, presumably a combination of the hot water heater and noninsulated water pipes.

Reviews.Title: “I recommend this place.”
Reviews.Author: 44881Jaw
Reviews.Content: Very clean, nice view, quiet resort. Good amenities. Close to the marina - you can rent a boat from there. There are enough restaurants and shopping nearby to be comfortable, but not so close to Branson that you have to endure the horrid traffic. Very close to Silver Dollar City, which is a nice daytrip.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to go back!”
Reviews.Author: marilynt_10
Reviews.Content: My family just returned from our trip to Branson. I am so glad that we decided to stay at Village at Indian Point. The people were so nice, the location was great, the lodge was very clean and roomy, the beds were comfy, it was very quiet and peaceful, the pool and hot tub was great, I could go on and on. We loved waking up to the beautiful view of the lake. The porch off of the master bedroom and living room was huge and we enjoyed eating out there and having coffee out there. It was perfect. The kids loved fishing, even though they didn't catch anything! I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a little extra room and a place more peaceful/quiet on their trip. We had three adults and 2 kids in a 2 bedroom and there was plenty of room. The master had a king size bed and the guest bedroom had a queen size bed. There was a pullout sofa and a small sofa in the living room.

Reviews.Title: “Loved every minute of it!”
Reviews.Author: alynn0482
Reviews.Content: We travel to Branson at least once a year, sometimes several times a year, but this was the first time we have stayed at The Village. From reading the reviews, it is apparent that the quality of one's stay at this establishment depends much on the condo you are assigned. The condo we were placed in from September 30-October 3 was very cozy (smaller than I expected), but also full of rustic charm that helped make our trip relaxing and enjoyable. The views from building 7 are absolutely gorgeous. The only bad thing about the view from the top floor is that there are 22-31 stairs to climb, depending on where you enter from. Everything in our child-friendly condo was very clean, and there were not too many things my 9 month old or 2 year old could get into and destroy. The kitchen had every utensil we needed, and there was plenty of HOT water. The pool is small, but there was never anyone else in it while we were swimming, and the wading pool was perfect for my 2 year old. There is also a small playground, but there are only swings and a 'tree-house' of sorts to climb into, so it will not hold a toddler's interest for as long as hunting for acorns to throw to squirrels along the nature trails. The office is only open from 9am to 5pm, which is inconvenient if you need anything after office hours, but I was only disappointed that my husband and son didn't get to experience the atmosphere of all the mounted wildlife around the massive stone fireplace that I was able to glance at during check-in. Since we don't have a boat, and swimming in lake water isn't appealing to us, we didn't mind that there is no place to dock or better lake access for swimming. While this place is very expensive, I think all of us would agree our trip was well worth the money we spent to stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Just OK”
Reviews.Author: Caaaaaaaa
Reviews.Content: The room was clean and very good. Dish washer was very load but did work. The only problem we had was the sleep quality and the bed The bed did not suit us, we got up each day with a sore back. We were on the second floor and the three couples above us on the third floor were rude. These were adults without kids and were up each night till about 2am laughing, talking and drinkng.

Reviews.Title: “loved it!”
Reviews.Author: northernILBecky
Reviews.Content: Had a wonderful time. The location is perfect, views are beautiful, condo clean, and very comfortable for two couples. Was way more than we expected. The lodge is beautiful. Staff great. very clean and well kept resort area. Nice indoor pool, hot tub. Had a wonderful stay!

Reviews.Title: “Love the View”
Reviews.Author: nikkiSpringHill_KS
Reviews.Content: We celebrated my husband's birthday with a trip to Branson and a stay at The Village. We enjoyed it very much. The view from the deck is our favorite. We have our meals on the deck and love to sit out and relax and listen to the sounds of nature, read and listen to our "tunes." Just one minor detail. We couldn't find the coffee. Everything else was there, handy and available, but no coffee. Hopefully next time it will be available.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: SippyCupMom
Reviews.Content: We stay here several times a year and love it! We always stay in a 2 bedroom, 2 bath condo. It's always cleaned and well stocked. It is right on the lake and there is a boat dock if you want to rent a boat. They got rid of the outdoor pool so it's only an indoor pool now, with a hot tub. I heard they will also be building an outdoor pool. Nice lodge, with fitness and games! Down the street from Silver Dollar City, but away from the strip and congestion! We love it!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in Branson area”
Reviews.Author: snowcat3681
Reviews.Content: My wife and I loved the rustic lodge look nestled amongst the trees. Our unit was tastefully decorated and well maintained. Our unit faced the lake and we enjoyed having coffee on the large covered patio. This place is much better than staying in a hotel. We will definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Resort-Can't wait to go back”
Reviews.Author: harrissix
Reviews.Content: This was a wonderful place for my family to spend Labor Day weekend. I was traveling with my four children ages 9, 10, 12, &14 and my mother in law. It was great having two bedrooms so we had separate space. We arrived late and there were easy to follow instructions for late check in. Couldn't be any easier. We also had to bring along my dog and they were very accommodating and a reasonable rate for adding a pet at $10/night. The place was near Silver Dollar City, which we visited two days of our stay. It was convenient yet had a secluded and serene feel. Another plus was the fact that dishwashing detergent was supplied, along with all the necessities--complete kitchenware, paper towels, even the salt and pepper! I brought my own laundry detergent so we had everything we needed. We love staying where we can cook our own meals, since I am always traveling with 6, eating out can get pricey! Wal-Mart is just a few miles down the road in Branson West, where you can go to get your groceries for your stay. It only took us about 15 minutes. The Village at Indian Point will definitely be at the top of my list on my next trip top Branson.

Reviews.Title: “WOW! Will come again!”
Reviews.Author: momofthreeinstlou
Reviews.Content: We go to Branson every summer with our three small children. This condo was so clean, spacious, and had so many family-oriented activities. This is the first time we have done a condo, but we had to have more than one room this time with three kids! It exceeded our expectations and we will absolutely return. The games, movies, and fishing pole rental at the desk were awesome! The pool was clean, however, an outdoor pool might help, too! I was so happy not to have to sit in the long line for SDC because there is a special pathway directly there if you stay at the Village. Awesome, we will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to relax and still enjoy Branson! WE WILL BE BACK”
Reviews.Author: Greg M
Reviews.Content: We were confident about going here after reading the reviews and to say the least we were not disappointed. This is a very nice, well maintained property in a beautiful setting (as long as you prefer rustic woods and trees versus concrete and asphalt) We arrived late, around 11pm, and as was promised, there was an envelope on the door with our name- inside was a key and a map which made it very easy to find our unit. We and the kids were blown away when we walked in- a well decorated and appointed unit (building 8, unit 10, Thanks Allens!) The covered and screened in deck provided a beautiful view of pine trees and a limited view of the lake. If you plan on going to Silver Dollar City, it doesn't get much easier than this- took us less than 5 minutes to get into the SDC parking lot. Depending on traffic, it took us about 15 minutes to get to the Branson strip. For a little more money this provided a nice quiet and relaxing stay. The only negative was the carpet (as we had read in some other reviews), which was a little worn and had some stains- most likely from careless and inconsiderate guests! Otherwise all the furnishings were very nice, beds were very good and the kitchen was well equipped- though we were on vacation so we didn't cook. We are already thinking about next year and will certainly return here.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, but putrid smell was rather offensive.”
Reviews.Author: Cadidlehopper
Reviews.Content: This was our second stay at the Village. We like it for its convenience to an annual event we attend next door at Rock Lane. These apartments are nice and easily accommodate two couples with the two bedrooms and two baths. Only complaint this time was a very pungent odor, which we suspect was from attempts to clean the extensive carpet stains. This had not been a probably on our first stay two years ago.

Reviews.Title: “Overall, this was a nice place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Iowagal_36
Reviews.Content: The rooms were nice and had a rustic cabin atmosphere. The location was very close to Silver Dollar City, so we had very quick access to the park. There were a few minor details with housekeeping that were disappointing, but overall it was a pleasant stay for our family.

Reviews.Title: “We won't come back...”
Reviews.Author: curtton
Reviews.Content: We rented a two bedroom/two bath condo. Our condo was lower level. The carpet was filthy and needed to be replaced or cleaned. There were dead insects in almost every room. Whoever was above us had a barking dog that started very early in the morning, and we could hear all foot-traffic above us that went until nearly midnight every night and started early around 5-6am. The business office hours are 9-5, so if you want coffee or necessities, you are out of luck if it isn't within those hours. I was told by the front desk to launder my towels in the provided washer/dryer (I have to purchase the detergent) instead of getting new towels at the front desk, as I would have been able to had we stayed at any motel for half the price. Vacation is supposed to be about relaxation, we go on vacation to get a break from housecleaning!

Reviews.Title: “Great Spot, but Difficult Water Access”
Reviews.Author: DoubleH88
Reviews.Content: We rented two condos for Aug 4-8th. The condo units were very nice, clean, and comfortable. They were also well stocked with kitchen utensils, towels, etc. We had a beautiful patio with a great view. The only downfall was that there is no boat ramp at this location and so we had to rent a slip a little ways away that we were unable to walk to. Besides the access to water, this was a great location. It is on the same road as Silver Dollar City, so it was very close to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful location just far enough from Branson for quiet, but close enough for attractions.”
Reviews.Author: LouJackMax
Reviews.Content: We just got back from spending 5 nights at the Village. It is everything that we expected. We had four of us (2 teenagers), and had plenty of room with the fold out sofa sleeper. The units are fully stocked with anything one would want in a home away from home. Our unit had a full size washer and dryer as well. The location is about 10 minutes away from the Branson "strip". Close enough to easily get in and our when we wanted to catch a show. We were very glad to not be in the "chaos" of the city but able to relax and have a nice vacation. The staff are friendly and helpful. We had only two minor issues: the towels and wash cloths are cheap and very rough. We ended up using our extra beach towels after showers and then laundrying them. Also, the units are not "right on the lake". The property does have a cove and dock, but the actual condos are farther away from the water than we expected. Still just a short walk though. Overall a great place to stay and we will go back.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home.....”
Reviews.Author: flyfisherman65
Reviews.Content: Nicely decorated,comfortable,quiet, beautiful indoor pool. Wonderful base camp when visiting Branson. We've stayed here many times. This year we were in cabin 8 unit 6.

Reviews.Title: “Great view, accomodations, and helpful staff make this a place we come back to every July.”
Reviews.Author: 7Krums5
Reviews.Content: This is our 3rd year at the Village with our kids, spouses, girlfriends, and grandchildren and have never been disappointed. We have been in the two bedroom units and the large units with lofts and all have been wonderful and met our needs. We have already booked again for next summer and enjoy the relaxing, quiet atmosphere and gorgeous views. We don't go into Branson except for one day out of seven, shop WalMart for groceries to save by eating in, use the Indian Point Marina for boat and jet ski rental for several days with an overnight boat slip rental allowing for evening cruising. Close to Silver Dollar City if we want to go and this year "Moonlight Madness" allowed us a choice of going at night. When weather is an issue (heat or rain) the indoor pool & hot tub offer a great alternative for kids and adults. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Looked into other condos but like the atmosphere of Village best-want to get away from crowds, noise, and rat race!

Reviews.Title: “Didn't Meet Expectations From Previous Year Condo”
Reviews.Author: miikeschair
Reviews.Content: Last years stay at lodge 9 unit 4 was awesome, but this year we stayed in lodge 9 unit 1 and we expected this years stay to be the same, but was disappointed. The location and view was beauitful, but the carpet was torn, dirty, and stained. There was food on the wall, bugs that had been smashed on the wall and not cleaned. There were also spider webs in every room. These were both pet friendly condos, and we appreciated the fact that we got to bring our pets, but we expected more for our money. The pool and sauna was awesome and the walking trails were great. We loved the Village of Indian Point, but will request a different lodge and unit next summer.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: stait81
Reviews.Content: Our condo was fantastic! During our latest trip to Branson we stayed at The Village at Indian Point...I could not have been happier. It is very close to Silver Dollar City, which made it easy to get back and forth from the park! The kitchen, laundry room, and spacious living areas allowed us to have a wonderful time!

Reviews.Title: “Great condo on indian point”
Reviews.Author: cschuten
Reviews.Content: We've stayed all over Branson and Indian Point in the last 10 years and "the village" is the nicest appointed condo and a very relaxed atmosphere. Bldgs 16 and 17 I believe have the best views and are also the newest. Everything you need except food and clothes is here. Stock up at Walmart on the way in unless you want to pay a small fortune at the convience stores located on Indian point. The grounds at Stillwater are better (accross the street) if outdoor pools are your thing - but be willing to pay much more for accomodations that are not near as nice. A few notes: Access to SIlver Dollar City is super easy as SDC has improved the entrance/exit for the people staying on indian point. Boat rental right down the street at Indian Point was the closest and least expensive. Boats were newer-ish and in good working condition. We rented tubes next door to that at the "Ski shop" - it's run by college kids so early morning When traveling around Branson make sure and take advantage of the red, yellow, blue and green routes. This will litterally save you hours. Trust me when I say that I've spent and hour trying to go to starbucks. One of the top 3 steaks I've ever had was at the Texas Land and Cattle co. in Branson Landing. Outstanding resturaunt and service was incredible.

Reviews.Title: “Home Away From Home”
Reviews.Author: Today_I_travel
Reviews.Content: This is the second time we have stayed here. We like the convenience of the condo. The lake view is great. Wish there was an outdoor pool but we enjoyed our great view from the deck/balcony instead of swimming. It is nicely located. We like the strip in Branson but we prefer not to stay there. The Village at Indian Point was close enough to Branson to go to shows and enjoy the activities there. We also like being close to the marina to rent boats and enjoy a relaxing day out on the lake. It is a very relaxing place to stay. The condo was well equipped with everything we needed. We brought a few of our own items along and found they were already supplied in the condo. I would suggest that you ask as many questions as you can when making reservations They are willing to answer the questions and you can get a room you want. Some condos are newer than others or more spacious. If you want a great view then be sure to request it. They were very accommodating and friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Great access to Silver Dollar City”
Reviews.Author: citylifemomma
Reviews.Content: Wooded setting is very nice and sets this rustic place apart from most other condos surrounded by asphalt slabs. Condo was very clean and we had a nice lake view (view will depend on which room you get so be sure to specify if this matters to you). Rooms were well-appointed and kitchen had everything we required. Front desk was very helpful, although we wished their hours extended later into the evening. One big plus is that when you want to head to Silver Dollar City, you've got a straight easy shot. Most of the traffic is backed up coming into the Park from route 76, but since the Village is on the opposite side of the park from Rt. 76, you avoid all of that 76 traffic. We booked Dixie Stampede tickets through the Village more than a month before we arrived expecting to get a late afternoon (5-ish) show, then got a phone call from the Village a day before our departure telling us that the seating we wanted was booked up. So calling early doesn't mean the Village will book your tickets early. In general, we would recommend buying tickets to anything in Branson AFTER you get there. There are discounts available all over town that are no better than discounts available from the Village. Also, this gives you more opportunity for spontaneous decisions/opportunities on what to see and do. The guest book in our room was a treasure trove of what shows are worth seeing and which were not so great. We would definitely come back again.

Reviews.Title: “The best we've experienced in or near Branson”
Reviews.Author: 4switz
Reviews.Content: Since each unit is unique, be sure to specify what you're looking for. Our experience would have been greatly improved by having 2 beds (any size!) in the 2nd bedroom for our adult children, but that may not even be an option here. A pull out couch for sleeping only works if everyone is on the same sleep/wake schedule; possibly a loft unit would have been best for us. Also, if you are looking for an outdoor pool, this is not the place for you. The staff members were all friendly, helpful and knowledgeable of the area. The units are fully equipped; some allow pets & some don't; some come with a boat slip & some don't. The grounds are well-maintained, and the location on Indian Point was perfect for our family reunion of 50-60 people. A hint if you're planning a similar event and want to have a gathering at the conference center: reserve it in advance of your visit.

Reviews.Title: “A little bit of heaven”
Reviews.Author: pill41033
Reviews.Content: They make you comfortable from the time they pick up the phone to take your reservation...I care how I am treated and our treatment was VIP..We have referred others to the Village and they felt the same way.. We think we would enjoy the Village in the dead of winter with snow on the ground..If your alpha waves need settling this iss the place..Think tranquil peaceful serene you got my drift. Beautifully decorated and thoughtfully appointed.with a view painted by God..

Reviews.Title: “The accommodations were excellent, the staff was friendly and helpful, and the views were lovely.”
Reviews.Author: TheDane_10
Reviews.Content: To save money, we pushed the physical space about as far as it could go - eight persons in two bedrooms and a loft - but it worked well for us, and provided a comfortable and attractive base from which to visit the area. It's a bit of a trek to downtown, but creative routing (using a good map) helps minimize that difficulty. If we returned to Branson, we would very likely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay, great amenities.”
Reviews.Author: jimsm69
Reviews.Content: I have been coming to Village at Indian Point for ten years, and wouldn't change a thing. We keep our boat less than half mile from VIP at Indian Point Marina and it's the perfect location for my family. The rooms are all large enough with nice kitchen and great decks. We have never had a bad or dirty room since we've been coming here. The staff is always friendly. Would highly recommend a stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Great condo, location and experience”
Reviews.Author: dontgotosandals
Reviews.Content: The Village at Indian Point was a great escape. Very peaceful-great facilities-friendly staff and super close to Silver Dollar City, Marinas, and "the strip" in Branson. On sunny days, you cannot beat the lake-beautiful scenery, clean water, safe boating-fun for all! On a rainy day, the indoor pool is great....if you go into Branson, the Titanic Exhibit is wonderful-and great for all ages. Thank you for a wonderful vacation!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great for families - very close to Silver Dollar City”
Reviews.Author: JimmyCy
Reviews.Content: The room was great and it was very spacious. We really appreciated the multiple bathrooms, full kitchen and washer/dryer. The view was beautiful from the deck as well. The fitness room needs to be upgraded, but all other amenities were excellent. We enjoyed the pool and the staff ordered our tickets to Silver Dollar City and Acrobats of China for us at a discount.

Reviews.Title: “Much better than any Branson hotel!”
Reviews.Author: 3painthorserider
Reviews.Content: We thoroughly enjoyed our short 3 day trip to Silver Dollar City and the location of this condo couldn't have been better. The amenities were great and allowed us to spend time with our friends without being cramped into a hotel room. The kids enjoyed the swimming pool and arcade and the view from our deck was spectacular! Would highly recommend the Village versus any hotel in Branson if traveling with any friends or family!

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms, needs a good cleaning, poor accessibility for the boater.”
Reviews.Author: luvtheson4-2
Reviews.Content: The room we stayed in was nicely decorated, furnished nice, things you would have at home. The room was not cleaned very good. The kitchen floor was dirty, the refridgerator had two months worth of dust on top of it as did other areas of the room. The bathroom in the Master bath had a dirty tub, inside and out. We brought our boat to the lake and you have to go to the resort next to the property and launch your boat, and the boat dock on one side is a very tight squeeze for any boat larger than twenty feet. So ask questions. This place would be fine for SDC, and other Branson tourism

Reviews.Title: “We just keep coming back!”
Reviews.Author: NikiD527
Reviews.Content: Beautiful condos with flexibility for lake view or non-lake view depending upon your budget. Reasonable rates. Peaceful and quiet!

Reviews.Title: “really great in all aspects”
Reviews.Author: dbarley46
Reviews.Content: we have a home on the lake of the ozarks but thinking of selling and moving to branson for our week end place. im retired so i could stay longer if i want or rent it out. will probably be back yet this year.

Reviews.Title: “WE CAN'T WAIT TO GO BACK AGAIN”
Reviews.Author: mimiKc
Reviews.Content: From the moment we stepped into our condo I did not want to leave. The decor was amazing, the beds were soft, the hammock on the covered deck was a plus and the fully equipped kitchen allowed us to save a ton of money. Five of us stayed in a 2bdr/2bth and it was more than enough room. The jacuzzi tubs were GREAT as well!! The staff were very friendly and helpful. I don't have one bad thing to say about this place!! Each time we visit branson, this is where we will stay.

Reviews.Title: “What a great place to relax and have fun!”
Reviews.Author: Jenteach
Reviews.Content: Our family loved the coziness of a home away from home and the location of the condo.

Reviews.Title: “We enjoyed our stay very much.”
Reviews.Author: DogsParksArkansas
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at The Village At Indian Point before and we like it very much and will stay there again when we come to Branson again. We stayed in a room with recliners and we enjoyed that also because we can really rest in recliners, I guess it is because we have them at home and we use them all the time, they make us feel at home.  We enjoyed our stay with you this year as well as all the other times we stayed with you.Thanks.

Reviews.Title: “Lodge 17 Unit 5 - Beautiful Accommodations”
Reviews.Author: STLalien
