Reviews.Content: We loved our view of the lake, and the room was decorated beautifully - nice kitchen with granite countertops, living area was very comfortable, nice beds and two decks - one small one off of the kitchen with a grill (which we didn't use) and a very large one overlooking the lake. The only down side was that you really had to respect your neighbors because the walls aren't very thick, and you can hear a lot of noise. That's the only reason that I didn't rate it at the very top, but I will definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful setting with many trees and beautiful views!”
Reviews.Author: Joandudley
Reviews.Content: We love this place. Each condo is different and there are dog friendly condos on the first floors of the 12-plexes.Each has two bedrooms and two baths that are private. The lodge offers discounts on the condos(like many hotels) and also on local attractions. It has a indoor pool and they are planning to have a zero-entry outside pool soon. It is a great place for two couples to share or a family.

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing”
Reviews.Author: kawmom2
Reviews.Content: My husband and our two children have been to Branson twice before, both time have stayed in a hotel. We decided to try a condo and what a wonderful decision it was. We had a great time. The Village at Indian Point it quite, relaxing and clean. Perfect for family and very kid friendly. We will definitely return again. Thanks for making our trip a memorable one.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: NcDss
Reviews.Content: We held a family reunion at The Village At Indian Point. The accommodations were very comfortable with beautiful views. We had a great time. I would enjoy a trip back there.

Reviews.Title: “Great Time”
Reviews.Author: kd789
Reviews.Content: Our condo was really nice. We were in building 8. There were two bedrooms, fully equiped kitchen and a laundry room. Loved having the convenience of a laundry room! I have to agree with a few of the other reviews that I read. The mattresses and pillows need updating. My only complaint was that the safety bar on the bathtub was on the wrong end and the tub was slippery. There were several families in our group and it was interesting to see how other condo's were decorated. The area was very nice and clean. We were there for a reunion trip and the place had a nice conference room that we were able to rent where we could meet for dinner and visit with each other. The kids really enjoyed the indoor pool. I was surprised at how small the pool was but the kids didn't mind. If I'm ever in the Branson area again, I will definitely say at The Villiage at Indian Point.

Reviews.Title: “Exceded Expectations!”
Reviews.Author: travelerLaCrosse
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful annual family reunion here -3condos all top floor-1 bldg #12 & 2 bldg #13. Super views and accommodations. The staff was great help in booking events, fixing a minor problem and replenishing paper products. The location was perfect to Table Rock Lake, shows, restaurants & golf. One condo came with a nearby boat slip for our boat. We had 7 grandchildren ages 10 to 14 and they loved the lake, pool , basketball hoop. golf & events. Highlights were Shanghai Circus, Titanic exhibit & the Zipline. The gals loved shopping Tanger outlet mall & The Landing downtown. Only negative was the workout equipment needs updating.

Reviews.Title: “Great family reunion getaway.”
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth99
Reviews.Content: Our family of 30, plus people including all ages, has been coming to Village at Indian Point for the past four years. We have had family reunions for the past 26 years, and we have never found a place that is as beautiful, reasonable, clean, and well mangaged as this resort. You may do a lot in the area, or stay put and enjoy the woods and the lake. The staff is very friendly and helpful. We are coming back again next year.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous family friendly place, with only very minor hitches!”
Reviews.Author: MissTAnn
Reviews.Content: We LOVED our time at The Village at Indian Point! Great accommodations for a family. Wonderful pool, is perfect for all ages! Game room is nice and everything we played was in good working condition! Same for the workout equipment, all functioned properly. Service was for the most part very friendly, informative and accommodating. We did have a small maintenance issue that occurred after normal business hours and they asked us to wait til the next morning to get it fixed. We ended up doing it ourselves because it was too bothersome to wait (the office lady did provide us the necessary equipment to accomplish the task), was a little bit of a frustrating situation, but certainly not a major issue. Our only complaint would be the beds. They were not good quality mattress and were VERY hard and uncomfortable. We kinda made a joke of it, but that was our biggest issue. Loved the upper level condo that we had because of its vaulted ceilings and the good balcony view. It is a was very well kept, peaceful and relaxing resort, and we would certainly return again!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: mommawillie
Reviews.Content: I was impressed, would do it again and again. Great location, close to Silver Dollar City and Showboat Branson Belle.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic experience”
Reviews.Author: Happiness4u
Reviews.Content: We were thrilled to see the facilities were as good or better than advertised. We stayed in a two bedroom condo which was clean and well maintained and well stocked with anything we needed. The people were friendly and helpful and even took time to tell us about all the restaurants in the area. The rates are very reasonable. I guess the best recommendation is that we will stay here again!!

Reviews.Title: “Very Cozy, Great Location”
Reviews.Author: ShadowKC
Reviews.Content: These condos were great. We stayed in a two bedroom, two bath with a balcony/view of the lake. It was quiet, plenty of room, well stocked kitchen and well maintained. We cooked "in" almost every meal though it is close to Branson if you are interested in going there. Indian Point is not very crowded and has a public marina (we do not own a boat) so it ended up being a very leisurely, relaxed vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful facility in an amazing setting.”
Reviews.Author: KJB88
Reviews.Content: We stayed in building 7 condo 6. it was very clean, and nicely decorated. We had two adults and two kids. It was a very nice and peaceful place to stay. Close to Silver Dollar City , a marina, and downtown Branson, yet far enough from the hustle and bustle. I highly reccommend staying here.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place”
Reviews.Author: DEB1113
Reviews.Content: Spent a week with daughters and their families!! Good rates, clean, quiet, well located to West Branson and Table Rock dam area. Will do it again.

Reviews.Title: “6 out of 10”
Reviews.Author: zaxmail
Reviews.Content: We have been going to branson for about 25 years, and we usually go 4 times each year. We have stayed at many places in Branson, however the last few years we have stayed at condos. I've booked our last few trips on reserve direct, which i believe they fill up the empty rooms that are not rented out. We stayed in lodge 5, on the top level which had a nice lakeview, but it was one of their oldest, outdated units, it was still clean, but not what we expected on the inside. The lady in the office was very friendly, however they did not have a night staff which made it a hassle when our a/c did not work properly. It was 93 degrees outisde and it took 6 hrs for the temp to drop from 80 to 78 degrees inside. I would recomend spending the extra money to get one of their newer lodges, which are higher numbers like 15, 16, or 17. They just finished thier indoor hot tub area which is awesome, the kids loved swiming, and they had a wading pool that was perfect for our 2 year old.

Reviews.Title: “What a great Facility”
Reviews.Author: moore800
Reviews.Content: this was our third time visit to "The Village at Indian Point". This is a very nice place with a spectacular view. Lodged in Blg 16. Beautiful well furnished unit with all the comforts of home! I would highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful condo with friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: ljc009
Reviews.Content: We stayed in lodge 17 and had the perfect 2 bedroom condo. Decor was recent, beautiful, and comfy. The kitchen had everything imaginable and the bedrooms even had night lites for the kids. Much better than staying on the strip. Silver Dollar City is just minutes away with no traffic since you are the opposite direction of town. The only problem was the rooms are a bit noisy since they have wood floors. The family upstairs made lots of noise, but were asleep by 11:30. Our children caught 4 fish at the fishing peir. Horseback riding at Bear Creek was incredible. $19/hour up mountain trails and by the creek.

Reviews.Title: “The Village At Indian Point condo and the view is very peacefull.”
Reviews.Author: shortee_5
Reviews.Content: We would recommend The Village At Indian Point to anyone who likes the peace and quite of nature, The condo was very clean and made us feel like we were at home. We plan to go back and stay for a longer time. The pool and rec area was very well kept up.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely ideal for our writers' group”
Reviews.Author: editor144
Reviews.Content: 20 outdoor writers and 25 industry partners stayed with Kent and Beverly Turner at The Village at Indian Point Resort the first week in May, 2010. I can't imagine nicer people or more perfect accommodations for our group. I am bringing my family back as soon as possible!

Reviews.Title: “Picture Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: Melody76
Reviews.Content: The setting is so peaceful. Views of both Table Rock Lake and the Ozark Mountains are always inspiring. The complex is a very quiet and relaxing getaway but still is easily accessible to any desired activities in the region. I have stayed at the Village at Indian Point four times now and have never been disappointed. My only regret is that I can only visit for short periods and not own a condo myself!

Reviews.Title: “most enjoyable vacation stay ever!!”
Reviews.Author: shaddoxRN
Reviews.Content: We stayed in building 5 condo 4. It was fantastic. Fully stocked kitchen for cooking family meals. Loved that the laundry room was away from the family room so it wasn't an interruption. The beds were very comfortable and the decor was beautiful! Our sons really enjoyed their stay especially with the game cube in the second bedroom. We will recommend Village at Indian Point to all our family and friends and will most assuredly be coming back! Oh let me not forget the fabulous jacuzzi!

Reviews.Title: “Great Branson Destination”
Reviews.Author: ilmaestro
Reviews.Content: Stayed in a 2BD/2BD Condo for three nights. Very nice views and private location. Very close to Silver Dollar CIty and 10 minutes from the strip. Staff very friendly and a good value. Would ask for a unit with a screened balcony if possible because of the pests.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place to stay in Branson, wouldn't stay anywhere else!”
Reviews.Author: rw2000
Reviews.Content: Couldn't have been happier, The Village at Indian Point was perfect! Stayed for 5 nights in a lodge with a loft, more than enough room for our extended family of 7. The price was great, location was great, and the staff at the front desk couldn't have been more friendly or helpful. All around a wonderful vacation....thanks!!

Reviews.Title: “The most incredible place to stay in Branson, MO”
Reviews.Author: TravelerMidwestKC
Reviews.Content: The condos at The Village at Indian Point were like staying in a fancy lodge in Colorado. The buildings are like fancy log homes. The condo decorations were very homey and made you feel so comfortable. Choose a condo with a lake view; it would be worth the wait. When we first arrived, we didn't want to leave our condo because it was so nice, so we went and bought groceries so we could eat at the condo instead of at a restaurant. The condo was immaculate, and the king-sized beds were comfortable and cute (they were 4-poster wrought-iron beds). The only problem we had was that the fireplace didn't work too well, but other than that, the rest of the condo stay was incredible. Would highly recommend this place. We had found it on the internet, and were so incredibly surprised when we actually saw it; surpassed our expectations. The location is only 5 minutes from Silver-Dollar City, yet is in a peaceful spot. They have a private dock where you can enjoy the lake and peacefulness. The package deals were handy; you could purcase Silver Dillar City and other shows at discount prices right at the reservation desk of the condos. Our young family also enjoyed the condos, and had plenty of space for a large family. The pool was mostly 3 1/2 feet - 5 feet in depth so best for older kids, but they did have a baby pool for very young kids.

Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay”
Reviews.Author: sinderella80
Reviews.Content: My husband & I stayed at the Village with our 3 children to celebrate our anniversary. The location was great & our favorite thing about the condo was the screened in back porch with an awesome view. The decor was great but we were a little disappointed in the size of the condo itself-we were expecting larger for the money. In addition, we were mislead by the pictures on their website so we expected the pool area to be bigger but our kids didn't seem to mind. All in all, our trip was good because we were able to relax & enjoy our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Trip”
Reviews.Author: toddOklahoma
Reviews.Content: We absolutely loved our stay at "The village at Indian Point". Great location and accommodations. We will definitely be back soon. You will not be disappointed in the least bit if you choose to stay at The Village.

Reviews.Title: “We have stayed at the Village four times and each time is a great vacation getaway”
Reviews.Author: LikestheLake
Reviews.Content: Our last trip was in October 2009. We took our boat for fishing and enjoyed having the boat slip. We enjoyed the condo. It had a good view of the lake off the balcony and the fireplace and full kitchen and laundry were wonderful. We cooked in for a few dinners and ate out for some. Of course, having all of Branson nearby gives a lot of options for daily or evening outings. Our teenagers loved the fishing and movies at the IMAX.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic place to relax and enjoy family”
Reviews.Author: DeeDee1912
Reviews.Content: Condo was beautiful, clean and so adequate for the six of us. Our view was fantastic and enjoyed it all hours of the day and night. We swam, played games, did laundry, cooked and grilled, utterly enjoying oneanother and our surroundings. The kids loved the loft with spiral stair case. Owner's Christmas decor was delightful as well as the normal cabin decor. Loved all the bears, moose and fish. The catfish in the loft was a big hit with the three year old grandson! Plan on a return visit soon.

Reviews.Title: “Undecided”
Reviews.Author: Wo0dy01
Reviews.Content: The last two times at the Village I have been disappointed. Thought it was a fluke the first time so I wrote it off with no comments. I feel the condition of the furnishings and the cleanliness are deteriorating. The overall setting is still outstanding but the concrete mattress, dirty dishes, rusty water when I started my shower, and carpeting whicht needed vacuumed.were disappointing. I have been going to the Village for quite a few years now and always very satisfied. Pondering looking for a new location. (had to make a recommendation below so for now YES but with reservations.)

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't stay anywhere else!”
Reviews.Author: Glencora_8
Reviews.Content: We used to own one of these condos, so we are very familiar with the quality and comfort of the condos at The Village at Indian Point. When we needed to go to the Branson area for a wedding recently and needed a place to stay, we headed straight for the Village at Indian Point because we knew we would not be disappointed. And YOU won't be disappointed either!!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful cozy winter getaway”
Reviews.Author: J_J_KTBug
Reviews.Content: We love to stay here in January after the Christmas holidays. It is a wonderful romantic getaway tucked in the woods with a woodburning fireplace (wood provided). We had 3 inches of snow this trip! Each condo is individually owned, so each one has different decor, some have flat screen tv's. They have fully equipped kitchens, washer/dryers, etc. And they are pet friendly, big plus! In the summer months, it is great if you want to go to Silver Dollar City, but not that close to town/shopping. We have stayed here numerous times and plan to go back.

Reviews.Title: “New Year's Eve Tradition!”
Reviews.Author: MidMOWineLovers
Reviews.Content: As always beautiful and bountiful accommodations. The new pool house and hot tub were fun and relaxing. Hope to try the sauna next time. Lodge 18, #7 has very comfortable king size beds with luxurious bedding. We love that Indian Point Road has been updated to bypass the Silver Dollar City traffic that we've dreaded in the past. Fun nightlife at "The Lakehouse" farther down on the point (formerly the Irish Pub). The front desk ladies were very accommodating and helpful in selecting the right condo. Ours was perfect for two couples- two king sized bedrooms, both with jacuzzi tubs, and a couch, loveseat, and glider rocker in the living room. Loved the wood burning fireplace, and the view from the balcony.

Reviews.Title: “Our New Years Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Slybester
Reviews.Content: We have stayed with this resort before. The rooms are beautiful, clean, well taken care of. We would certainly stay here again. We did have a problem after using the pool with chemical burns from the chlorine being to high in the pool. Otherwise the rest of the trip was wonderful.

Reviews.Title: “Totally Awesome!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Tamara6364
Reviews.Content: This is the best place we have stayed in Branson in long time. We visit Branson at least twice a year. I will be calling Village at Indian Point again.

Reviews.Title: “nice christmas getaway”
Reviews.Author: familyfun39
Reviews.Content: nice christmas vacation with my family and the condo was excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Great place for a family vacation”
Reviews.Author: HappyCamper1911
Reviews.Content: We had a great time in Branson. Condo was roomy and gave us plenty of elbow room. It seemed to have everything we needed including the firewood! Nice drive to the strip but far enough away from town. Would like to visit during boating season!

Reviews.Title: “A perfect family condo for a weekend in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: lenairasmom
Reviews.Content: We stayed here again this fall for our annual trip to Branson and Silver Dollar City with our four grandchildren. Plenty of room, three TV's with dvd players and game systems, and movies, books, and board games for the kids. The location is so convenient to everything, but the condos are in a secluded-feeling woodsy environment with great views and decor. Everything is neat, clean and comfortable. We highly recommend the Village at Indian Point.

Reviews.Title: “peaceful, relaxing, everyone had a great time - all 32 of us !!!”
Reviews.Author: funfunfun007
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at The Village At Indian Point for 5 years now. Our entire family goes to Branson for Thanksgiving, we get 6 to 8 rooms every year. They are nice, clean, decorated well and quiet. This year we rented the lodge great room so we could all eat together !! It was BEAUTIFUL :) we built a fire, the pool was right there for the kids, and we could all be together in one room. We even cooked our turkey outside !!

Reviews.Title: “relaxing”
Reviews.Author: daisyMO
Reviews.Content: Both my husband and I love to stay at Village at Indian Point. Our condo was OK, we have stayed in better ones in the past. The only real complaint was our bed. Too firm and I thought we were getting a king but it was a queen. That's OK, but we fought with the mattress pad the entire trip. It was in bad shape. I don't know how its stayed on the bed. The pillows were so thin that I had to use two. Would I recommend staying there...Yes. Would I stay there again...Yes. I just won;t stay in that condo again. :-)

Reviews.Title: “We love The Village at Indian Point”
Reviews.Author: sunshine0046
Reviews.Content: This was our third Thanksgiving at The Village at Indian Point. We had a great time and the condo we stayed in this year was our favorite. The last two were very nice, but this one had king size beds in both bedrooms and 2 chairs and sofa in the living area as opposed to just 1 chair and sofa in the last two. The beds were some of the most comfortable I had ever slept in. The view of the lake was great , the location is perfect as it is very quiet in the wooded setting and close to SDC. The condo was decorated beautifully and was very clean. We didn't want to leave! Will definitely ask for this condo when we come back again. And we will definitely be back. The only drawback I can think of is that the time there just went by too fast!! Oh, can't forget this...the staff couldn't have been nicer.

Reviews.Title: “Peaceful”
Reviews.Author: lisa1073
Reviews.Content: We were on the third level with a walking trail behind our condo that you could see from our balcony. There was a bench on this trail and one morning there was a very large buck lying next to it. We also had a beautiful view of Table Rock Lake. The rooms were very clean and well maintained.

Reviews.Title: “Great look with all the wood and log buildings!”
Reviews.Author: MommyFolsom_La_
Reviews.Content: The ladies that work in the front office were very nice and helpful. It is a beautiful setting over the lake. We were not at all happy with the hard,creaky old beds in our room.After traveling 600 miles to get there,you would want a comfortable bed, but that was not the case.The two frying pans in the kitchen needed to go in the trash. I don't like teflon in my food. We lost a nights stay because we could not sleep there one more night, so we left early.If we do return, I know which unit not to stay in.

Reviews.Title: “enjoyed it”
Reviews.Author: marissagal
Reviews.Content: village at Indian Point is a couple miles from silver dollar city and a few miles from a grocery store. we did not travel 10 miles after arriving. the place was clean and well furnished. Very relaxing place with dog friendly accomodations. Playground for preschool and school age kids. very safe and homey atmosphere. great people to check you in.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Accommodations”
Reviews.Author: maotx
Reviews.Content: The condo was beautiful. Very tastefully decorated and well equipped. Very nice place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect weekend with great friends and lots of laughs!”
Reviews.Author: Kansasteacher
Reviews.Content: Staying at The Village at Indian Point made a wonderful weekend even better. We stayed at Lodge 7 on the top floor. The condo was very clean and had everything we needed for our weekend stay. Only had to buy the groceries we needed to fix breakfast. Our condo even had laundry detergent for guests! Our beds were extremely comfortable and the furniture was very nice. The ladies in the office were very helpful with suggestions of shows to see and then getting tickets reserved for us. We stayed here 7 years ago and will definitely stay here again. I will recommend it to other friends heading to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Silver Dollar City Fall Trip”
Reviews.Author: woodnkc
Reviews.Content: The view was the very best, building 5. We were told it was the first built. By that I will tell you the same mattress is still on the beds from when it was built. The worse mattresses we have ever had, thought about sleeping on the floor. All seemed clean but behind the master bathroom door, dust bunnies and the bathtub had no shine, needed a good scrub. Sink in the kitchen was brown from stains, covered with rubber mats. I decided to clean, but they donot believe in dish soap, only dishwasher soap. No hand soap in the kitchen or sanitizer (I went and purchased) ... didnot like doing laundry twice a day (you have to do your own towels ) no exchange daily on towels. And my family takes two showers a day, so more towels needed each time, since one a person is there. We couldnot get swimming pool towels from the office closes at 6 pm and pool is open till 9 pm. Beautiful new indoor pool Also, we had to go down three flights of steps to use a grill, for there is none on the decks. This should be known if you have little ones and cannot leave them alone in the condo and tend to food on the grill. We would go again, just ask for another condo on the bed situation and now we know to take some of our own towels, soap, etc..

Reviews.Title: “What a view!”
Reviews.Author: KansasCityNellie
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have stayed at the Village at Indian Point on about 3 other occasions. We just keep coming back because we enjoy it so much. This trip was one of the best so far. The lady at the front desk was so helpful, she made the contacts for our tickets and helped us find a resturant we wanted to visitagain. When we woke up Sunday morning the view from the balcony was breathtaking. The sky was all shades of pink over the lake with the fall colors bursting from the surrounding trees. We will return first chance we get.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful time - beautiful view -will stay again!!!”
Reviews.Author: charlesandsherrye
Reviews.Content: We stayed a year ago at the Village - We so enjoyed it we decided to make it an annual trip. Our wonderful church family paid for the trip for us. The condo we stayed in this time was not as nice as the one we stayed in last time - One positive thing about the condo the guest bedroom bed was delightful to sleep on. We missed not having a side patio and an electric grill. We had both the first time we stayed. I truly think for the amount of money - the condo should furnish laundry soap and softner sheets. Our iron in our condo did not work correctly.

Reviews.Title: “There are probably better places to stay with as good if not better locations”
Reviews.Author: chololindo
Reviews.Content: Internet didn't work, not much of a view from the condo we stayed in. For some reason it seemed we got the worst condo on the property even though the place was empty. Not good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: “This condo complex is simply wonderful”
Reviews.Author: Boaters63
Reviews.Content: We've stayed here several times over the past few years, and we will keep coming back. The ladies in the office are more helpful and nice to work with than any other condo resort we tried in the past, the condo's we've gotten are always perfectly clean and very nicely decorated, they always help us with slips for our boat, and we couldn't ask for anything more in a rental condo arrangement. We recommend the Village at Indian Point to anyone and everyone that has an interest in a rental condo over a hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent, a great place in all respects”
Reviews.Author: bmcHouston
Reviews.Content: WE enjoyed our stayat The Village. The rooms were excellent and the view was splendid.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome place to stay with both fireplace and excellent view of Lake”
Reviews.Author: mikemcn01
Reviews.Content: This place was both close to Branson allowing for quick drives into the city while being far enough away that all it seemed like you were staying at a cabin in the woods. Excellent location close to Silver Dollar City that bypassed all the normal traffic from Branson on the weekend. Rooms were very nice with plenty of space, fully equipped kitchen, and nice wood fireplace.

HotelInfo.Name: Village At Indian Point
HotelInfo.Address: 24 Village Trail, Branson, MO 65616
